#Text=Wikinews interviews Jim Babka , chair of Libertarian organization Downsize DC
#Text=Thursday , April 3 , 2008
#Text=A reporter from Wikinews recently interviewed Jim Babka , chair of Libertarian organization Downsize DC .
#Text=The organization claims to have arranged for 22,158 people to send a message regarding the " American Freedom Agenda Act " proposed by Ron Paul , in addition to supporting many other laws .

column1: #Text=The full text of the interview can be found below .
#Text=Interview
#Text=What is Downsize DC ?
#Text=DownsizeDC.org is an organization that makes it easy for every day citizens , with jobs and busy lives , to express their wishes to their two Senators and Representative .
#Text=It 's free and quite easy to use .
#Text=The DownsizeDC.org system combines education , recruitment , and activism into one simple , seamless process .
#Text=And once someone sends a message , they begin receiving our free email newsletter , or as we prefer to describe it , they become part of the Downsize DC Army .
#Text=Voltaire said , " God tends to be on the side of the bigger battalions . "

#Text=And we 're looking to build the Downsize DC Army so large that Congress cannot afford to ignore us â€“ so big that we can get our message of small , Constitutionally-limited government out everywhere
#Text=Why do you believe the federal government has grown too large ?
#Text=Big government at all levels steals about half of everything Americans earn .
#Text=We do n't believe politicians know best how to spend your money or run your life .
#Text=We want you to be able to keep what you earn ; to spend , to save , to invest , and to give away as you see fit .
#Text=We recognize that big government really does n't work well .
#Text=Big government has damaged education and health care .
#Text=It has made us more vulnerable to terrorism while trading away our liberty .
#Text=It has served the interests of large corporate conglomerates at the expense of individuals .
#Text=We want to make better education and health care more readily available to you .
#Text=We want you to live in safety and keep your civil liberties .
#Text=We want to put an end to corporate welfare .
#Text=The Constitution is our guide , and it limits the powers of the federal government .
#Text=We want the Constitution restored .
#Text=We believe that we must Downsize DC so that we can have greater peace and human progress .
#Text=If you could change one aspect of government what would it be and why ?
#Text=What a terrible question to ask someone like me !
#Text=It would 've been much easier to ask me what parts of government I would like to keep .
#Text=But seriously , if you 're going to put a gun to my head like that I would say real legislative reform .
#Text=Each year and every crisis , government will grow .
#Text=The legislative rules are written so that the results are virtually guaranteed â€“ more expensive and intrusive government .
#Text=The incentives in the current legislative environment are all wrong .
